title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2763/90 of 27 September 1990 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 2763/90
of 27 September 1990
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80 determining the intervention centres for cereals
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1. In the section headed 'France' in the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80, the amendments set out in Annex I to this Regulation are hereby made for the departments concerned.
In addition, the intervention centres at Vendôme in Loir-et-Cher and at Chambéry in Savoy are deleted from the list in respect of all cereals.
2. The intervention centres listed in Annex II to this Regulation shall be added to the section headed 'Bundesrepublik Deutschland' in the Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 2006/80.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 3 October 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 September 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 281, 1. 11. 1975, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 28. 5. 1990, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 130, 19. 5. 1976, p. 8.
(4) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1980, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 192, 7. 7. 1989, p. 14.
